snippet: Mike Daisey’s new series of monologues, “All the Faces of the Moon,” will take place over 29 nights at the Public Theater.
abstract: Mike Daisey’s new series of monologues All the Faces of the Moon, which aims to tell secret history of New York, will take place over 29 nights at the Public Theater.
lead_paragraph: Mike Daisey’s new series of monologues, “All the Faces of the Moon,” will take place over 29 nights at the Public Theater.

headline.seo: ‘All the Faces of the Moon’ Is Monologues on New York
headline.main: A Take on the City Will Take Some Time
headline.print_headline: A Take on the City Will Take Some Time
